certifications.title: Full Stack Web Development With MERN Stack Projects

projects.name: POINT OF SALE APP
projects.description: Created a responsive point of sale web app automating email invoicing system to send detailed receipts to users post-purchase Implemented Google OAuth for secure user authentication and seamless login experience Built a real-time dashboard that updates product categories and total sales, providing up-to-date information for efficient management.

projects.name: CouchSurfing (NomadNights)
projects.description: Developed a couch surfing platform enabling guests to find and book accommodations worldwide. Implemented user authentication with email verification Integrated Mapbox to display and filters available houses globally, and enabled image uploads for house listings using Multer.

projects.name: To-DoList
projects.description: Implemented features for adding, completing, and deleting tasks with a visually appealing interface. Utilized these technologies for efficient data management and dynamic content updates.

experiences.description: Recruited as a frontend developer Intern to learn and contribute to technology projects and enrich my skills in frontend development I have successfully developed a static frontend cosmetic webpage designed to provide an excellent user experience.
